Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I should have known that you would be here...Professor McGonagall.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Good evening, Professor Dumbledore. Are the rumours true, Albus?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I'm afraid so, Professor. The good, and the bad.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: And the boy?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Hagrid is bringing him.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Do you think it wise to trust Hagrid with something as important as this?

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Ah, Professor, I would trust Hagrid with my life.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No, sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh. Try not to wake him. There you go.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are...

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: The only family he has.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Exactly. He's better off growing up away from all that. Until he is ready.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: There, there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Good luck...Harry Potter.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Up. Get up.  Now!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Oh, here he comes, the birthday boy!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Happy birthday, son.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Aren’t they wonderful, darling?

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: How many are there?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Thirty-six. Counted 'em myself.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Thirty-six?! But last year last year I had thirty-seven!!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Err yes, well, some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: I don't care how big they are!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Make it move.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Move!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: MOVE!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He's asleep!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: He's boring.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.  Can you...hear me?  It's just...I've never talked to a snake before. Do you...I mean...do you talk to people often?  You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?  I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Mummy, dad, come here! You won't believe what this snake is doing!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

Name: Snake
Line: Thanks.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Anytime.

Name: Man
Line: SNAKE!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Mum, mummy!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: AHH!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Mum, help! Help me!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: My darling boy! How did you get in there?! How did you get in there? Dursley, oh, Dursley!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: It's all right. It's all right.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ow!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: What happened?!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I swear I don't know!  One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: There's no such thing as magic!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Awww, smile.  Vernon, just look at him. I can't believe it. In just a week you'll be off to Smeltings.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Caveat Smeltona. Proudest moment of my life.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Will I have to wear that, too?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: What, you? Go to Smeltings?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Ha!

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Oh, don't be so stupid, you're going to the state school where you belong.  And this is what you're gonna be wearing when I've finished dyeing it.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But that's Dudley's old uniform. It'll fit me like bits of old Elephant skin.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: It'll fit you well enough. Go get the post.  Go!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Oh, Marge is ill! Ate a funny whelk.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Dad! Look! Harry's got a letter!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hey, give it back! It's mine!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Yours? Who'd be writing to you?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: No more mail through this letterbox.

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Have a lovely day at the office, dear.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Shoo! Go on!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Fine day Sunday. In my opinion, best day of the week. Why is that, Dudley?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Because there's no post on Sunday?

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Ah, right you are, Harry. No post on Sunday. Ha! No blasted letters today. No, sir. Not one single bloody letter, not one.  No, sir, not one blasted, miserable-

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: AHH! Make it stop! Please make it stop!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Go away, ahh!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: What is it? Please tell me what's happening!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Give me that! Give me that letter!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Get off! Ahh!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Ahh!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: They're my letters! Let go of me!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: That's it! We're going away! Far away! Where they can't find us!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Daddy's gone mad, hasn't he?!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Make a wish, Harry.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: Who's there? Ahh!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Sorry 'bout that.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: I demand that you leave at once, sir! You are breaking and entering!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.  Boy, I haven't seen you since you was a baby, Harry, but you're a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly 'round the middle!

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: I-I-I'm not Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I-I am.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, well, of course you are! Got something for ya. 'Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it'll taste fine just the same. Ahh. Baked it myself.  Words and all. Heh.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thank you!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: It's not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me, who are you?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Rubeus Hagrid. Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts. Course, you'll know all about Hogwarts.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry, no.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No? Blimey, Harry, didn't you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Learned what?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: You're a wizard, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I-I'm a what?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: A wizard. And a thumping good one at that, I'd wager. Once you train up a little.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, you've made a mistake. I can't be...a-a wizard. I mean, I'm just... Harry. Just Harry.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Well, just Harry. Did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn't explain when you were angry or scared?  Ah.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we’d put a stop to this rubbish!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: You knew? You knew all along and you never told me?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as ... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: A car crash? A car crash kill James and Lily Potter?

Name: Petunia Dursley
Line: We had to tell him something.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: It's an outrage! It's a scandal!

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: He'll not be going!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself's going to stop him, are you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Muggle?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Non magic folk.  This boy's had his name down ever since he was born!  He's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he'll be under the finest headmaster that Hogwarts has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.

Name: Vernon Dursley
Line: I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Never, insult Albus Dumbledore, in front of me.

Name: Dudley Dursley
Line: Ahh!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh, um, I'd appreciate if you didn't tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. Strictly speaking, I'm not allowed to do magic.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Okay.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Ooh, we're a bit behind schedule. Best be off.  Unless you'd rather stay, of course. Hmm?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: First year students will require: three sets of work robes, one wand.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Essential bit of equipment, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: One pair of dragon-hide gloves.  Hagrid, do they mean for a real dragon?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Well, they don't mean for a penguin, do they? Heh. Crikey, but not a dragon.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But you like a dragon?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Fast and misunderstood beasts, Harry. Fast and misunderstood.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: All students must be equipped with...one standard size two pewter cauldron and may bring if they desire either an owl, a cat or a toad. Could we find all this in London?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: If you know where to go.

Name: Tom
Line: Ah, Hagrid! The usual, I presume?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No thanks, Tom. I'm on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.

Name: Tom
Line: Bless my soul. It's Harry Potter.

Name: Man
Line: Welcome back, Mr. Potter, welcome back.

Name: Witch
Line: Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter. I can't believe I'm meeting you at last.

Name: Quirinus Quirrell
Line: Harry P-potter. C-can't tell you how pleased I am to meet you.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Hello, Professor. I didn't see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh, nice to meet you.

Name: Quirinus Quirrell
Line: F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, e-eh, Potter? Heheh.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Yes, well, must be going now. Lots to buy. Heh.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Goodbye.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: See, Harry, you're famous!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But why am I famous, Hagrid? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: I'm not exactly sure I'm the right person to tell you that, Harry.  Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley.  Here's where you'll get your quills and ink, and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry.

Name: Boy
Line: It's a world class racing broom. Look at it, it’s the new Nimbus 2000! It's the fastest model yet.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But, Hagrid, how am I to pay for all this? I haven't any money.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Well, there's your money, Harry.  Gringotts, the Wizard Bank. T'aint no place safer, 'cept perhaps Hogwarts.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly are these things?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: They're goblins, Harry. Clever as they come goblins, but not the most friendly of beasts. Best stick close to me.  Mr. Harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal.

Name: Goblin
Line: And does Mr. Harry Potter have his key?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh. Wait a minute. Got it here somewhere. Hah. There's the little devil.  Oh, and there's something else as well.  Professor Dumbledore gave me this.  It's about you-know-what in vault you-know-which.

Name: Goblin
Line: Very well.

Name: Griphook
Line: Vault 687. Lamp, please.  Key please.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Didn't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing now, did ya?

Name: Griphook
Line: Vault 713.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's in there, Hagrid?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Can't tell you, Harry. It's Hogwarts business. Very secret.

Name: Griphook
Line: Stand back.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Best not mention this to anyone, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I still need...a wand.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: A wand? Well, you'll want Ollivanders.  No place better. Run along there, but wait. I just got one more thing I got to do. Won't be long.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hello? Hello?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: I wondered when I'd be seeing you, Mr. Potter. It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands.  Ah. Here we are.  Well, give it a wave.  Apparently not.  Perhaps this.  No, no, definitely not! No matter...  I wonder.  Curious, very curious.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Sorry, but what's curious?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: I remember every wand I've ever sold, Mr. Potter. It just so happens that the phoenix, whose tail feather resides in your wand gave one other feather, just one. It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: And...who owned that wand?

Name: Garrick Ollivander
Line: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things...terrible, yes, but great.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Harry! Harry! Happy birthday!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wow.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: You all right, Harry? You seem very quiet.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: He killed my parents, didn't he? The one who gave me this. You know, Hagrid, I know you do.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: First, and understand this, Harry, 'cause it's very important. Not all wizards are good. Some of them go bad. A few years ago, there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go. And his name was V-...his name was V-...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Maybe if you wrote it down?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: No, I can't spell it. All right.  Voldemort.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Voldemort?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Shh!!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: It was dark times, Harry, dark times.  Voldemort started to gather some followers, brought 'em over to the dark side. Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead. Your parents fought against him, but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em.  Nobody...not one. ‘Cept you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Me? Voldemort tried to kill...me?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Yes. That ain't no ordinary cut on your forehead, Harry. A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse...and an evil curse at that.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What happened to...to You-Know-Who?

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: What're you looking at?  Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in 10 minutes. Here's your ticket.  Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Platform 9¾? But, Hagrid, there must be a mistake. This says Platform 9¾. There's no such thing...is there?

Name: Man
Line: Sorry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me, excuse me.

Name: Guard
Line: Right on your left, ma'am.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me, sir. Can you tell me where I might find Platform 9¾?

Name: Guard
Line: 9¾? Think you're being funny, do ya?

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: It's the same year after year. Always packed with Muggles, of course.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Muggles?

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Come on. Platform 9¾ this way! All right, Percy, you first.

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Fred, you next.

Name: George Weasley
Line: He's not Fred, I am!

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: Honestly, woman, you call yourself our mother.

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: Oh, I'm sorry, George.

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: I'm only joking. I am Fred.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Excuse me! C-could you tell me how to-

Name: Molly Weasley
Line: How to get on the platform? Yes, not to worry, dear. It's Ron's first time to Hogwarts as well.  Now, all you've got to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms 9 and 10. Best do it at a bit of a run if you're nervous.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Line: Good luck.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: No, not at all.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'm Ron, by the way. Ron Weasley.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm Harry. Harry Potter.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: So-so it's true? I mean, do you really have the...the...

Name: Harry Potter
Line: The what?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Scar...?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Oh

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Wicked.

Name: Woman
Line: Anything off the trolley, dears?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No, thanks, I'm all set.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: We'll take the lot!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Whoa!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: They mean every flavour! There's chocolate and peppermint, and there's also spinach, liver and tripe. George sweared he got a bogey-flavoured one once!

Name: Harry Potter
Line: These aren't real chocolate frogs, are they?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: It's just a spell. Besides, it's the cards you want. Each pack's got a famous witch or wizard. I got about 500 meself.  Watch it!  Oh, that's rotten luck. They've only got one good jump in them to begin with.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I got Dumbledore!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I got about 6 of him.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hey, he's gone!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Well, you can't expect him to hang around all day, can you?  This is Scabbers, by the way, pathetic, isn't he?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: A little.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Fred gave me a spell as to turn him yellow. Want to see?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Yeah!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahem. Sun-

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Has anyone seen a toad? A boy named Neville's lost one.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: No.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh, are you doing magic? Let's see then.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Sunshine, daises, butter mellow, turn this stupid fat rat yellow!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Are you sure that's a real spell? Well, it's not very good, is it? Of course I've only tried a few simple spells myself, and they've all worked for me. For example...  Oculus Reparo.  That's better, isn't it? Holy Cricket, you're Harry Potter. I'm Hermione Granger...and you are...?

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: I'm...Ron Weasley.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Pleasure. You two better change into your robes. I expect we'll be arriving soon.  You've got dirt, on your nose, by the way, did you know? Just there.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Right, then! First years! This way, please! Come on, now, don't be shy! Come on now, hurry up!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Hello, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Hey, Hagrid.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Whoaa!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Right then. This way to the boats! Come on, now, follow me.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Wicked.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Welcome to Hogwarts. Now, in a few moments, you will pass through these doors and join your classmates. But before you can take your seats, you must be sorted into your houses. They are Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, and Slytherin. Now while you’re here, your house will be like your family. Your triumphs will earn you house points. Any rule breaking, and you will lose points. At the end of the year, the house with the most points is awarded the house cup.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Line: Trevor!  Sorry.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: The sorting ceremony will begin momentarily.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Line: It's true then, what they're saying on the train. Harry Potter has come to Hogwarts.  This is Crabbe and Goyle. And I'm Malfoy...Draco Malfoy.  Think my name's funny, do you? No need to ask yours. Red hair, and a hand-me-down robe? You must be a Weasley. Well, soon find that some wizarding families are better than others, Potter. Don’t want to go making friends with the wrong sort. I can help you there.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I think I can tell who the wrong sort are for myself, thanks.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: We're ready for you now. Follow me.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: It's not real, the ceiling. It's just bewitched to look like the night sky. I read about it in Hogwarts: A History.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Will you wait along here, please? Now, before we begin, Professor Dumbledore would like to say a few words.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: I have a few start of term notices I wish to announce. The first years please note that the dark forest is strictly forbidden to all students. Also, our caretaker, Mr. Filch  has asked me to remind you that the 3rd floor corridor on the right hand side is out of bounds to everyone who does not wish to die a most painful death. Thank you.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: When I call your name, you will come forth, I shall place the sorting hat on your head, and you will be sorted into your houses. Hermione Granger.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Oh, no. Okay, relax.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Mental that one, I'm telling you.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Ah, right then...hmm...right. Okay...Gryffindor!!

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Draco Malfoy.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: SLYTHERIN!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: There isn't a witch or wizard who went bad who wasn’t in Slytherin.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Susan Bones.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Ahh!

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Harry, what is it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Nothing... nothing, I'm fine.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Let's see...I know...Hufflepuff!

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Ronald Weasley.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Ha! Another Weasley. I know just what to do with you... Gryffindor!!

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Harry Potter.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Hmm...difficult, very difficult. Plenty of courage I see, not a bad mind, either. There's talent, oh yes, and a thirst to prove yourself. But where to put you?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not Slytherin. Not Slytherin.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Not Slytherin, eh? Are you sure? You could be great, you know. It’s all here in your head. And Slytherin will help you on the way to greatness! There's no doubt about that. No?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Not Slytherin...anything but Slytherin.

Name: Sorting Hat
Line: Well, if you're sure... better be... GRYFFINDOR!!

Name: Fred Weasley
Line: We got Potter! We got Potter!

Name: George Weasley
Line: We got Potter! We got Potter!

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Line: Your attention, please.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Let the feast...begin.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Wow.

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: I'm half and half. Me dad's a Muggle. Mam's a witch. Bit of a nasty shock for him when he found out.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Say, Percy, who's that teacher talking to Professor Quirrell?

Name: Percy Weasley
Line: Oh, that's Professor Snape, head of Slytherin house.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: What's he teach?

Name: Percy Weasley
Line: Potions. But everyone knows it's the Dark Arts he fancies. He's been after Quirrell’s job for years.

Name: Ron Weasley
Line: Ahh!

Name: Nearly Headless Nick
Line: Hello! How are you? Welcome to Gryffindor.

Name: Bloody Baron
Line: Whoo-hoo-hoo!

Name: Girl
Line: Look, it’s the Bloody Baron!

Name: Percy Weasley

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Never better.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: Another year, gone! And now, as I understand it, the house cup needs awarded and the points stand thus. In fourth place: Gryffindor, with 312 points!  In third place: Hufflepuff, with 352 points!  Second: Ravenclaw, with 426 points!  And in first place, with 472 points: Slytherin house!  Yes, well done Slytherin, well done Slytherin. However, recent events must be taken into account and I have a few last minute points to award.  First, to Miss Hermione Granger, for the cool use of intellect while others were in grave peril: fifty points!  Second, to Mr Ronald Weasley, for the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years: fifty points!  And third, to mister Harry Potter, for pure love and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house: sixty points!

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: We're tied with Slytherin!

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Line: And finally: it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends. I award ten points to Neville Longbottom!  Assuming that my calculations are correct, I believe that a change of decoration is in order!  Gryffindor wins the House Cup!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Yes!

Name: Seamus Finnigan
Line: Neville!

Name: Lee Jordan
Line: Yeah! We won!!

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Come on now, hurry up. You'll be late. Train's leaving. Go on. Go on. Come on. Hurry up.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Come on, Harry.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: One minute.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Thought you were leaving without saying good-bye, didja?  This is for you.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: Thanks, Hagrid.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: Oh. Go on...on with you.  Oh, listen, Harry, if that dolt of a cousin of yours, Dudley, gives you any grief, you could always, um, threaten him with a nice pair of ears to go with that tail of his.

Name: Harry Potter
Line: But Hagrid, we're not allowed to do magic away from Hogwarts. You know that.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Line: I do. But your cousin don't, do he? Eh?  Off you go.

Name: Hermione Granger
Line: Feels strange to be going home, doesn't it?

Name: Harry Potter
Line: I'm not going home. Not really.
